channel.title: Skillcape Button PI
channel.description:
I looked at a few Tuts and i managed to make the scroll go further down to show the skill cape emote. But when i look it doesn't show the button its just blank. When you hover your mouse over it shows its there. Help? To make it show. Here's a what it looks like:
[ftp=ftp://img156.imageshack.us/i/helppicture.png/]http://img156.imageshack.us/i/helppicture.png/[/ftp]

Could any of you Teamviewer help me? I will be very grateful.

item.title: Skillcape Button PI
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

so when you move your mouse on it you can see it though right? Go to client.java and find all you other interface codes and just change the skillcape one to a solid not a hover. If that doesnt work i dont know i dont code client sided

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcape Button PI

item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

you most have added the interface as a hover button, go to client.java (client sided) and change the interface to a regular interface
